example.text: [[user]] is a bum! Stop blaming Congress for your mistakes.

Great bipartisan meeting in Alamosa with the Mayor, City Manager, Economic Development Director, Director of Parks and Recreation and other city officials. I appreciated the updates and we discussed different opportunities to work together to improve the local community. [[url]]

My office and I have returned over $1,945,445 to constituents-many of whom were veterans having issues with the VA. From helping a veteran who had to wait 14 months for care cut through the bureaucracy, to helping another veteran get immediate open-heart surgery that saved his life, my team and I are always busy helping veterans receive the care they EARNED. If you or a veteran you know are having issues with the VA, please reach out to my office so we can get to work on your behalf.
[[user]] is a bum! Stop blaming Congress for your mistakes.

Enjoyed touring the Closed Basin Project. The important project provides nearly 20,000 acre-feet of water annually, primarily for the Alamosa National Wildlife Refuge and irrigation in the San Luis Valley. Water is one of the most important issues facing the Third District and… [[url]] [[url]]
The same day that I spoke at a press conference demanding accountability for the WHO, the NIH defunded the Wuhan Institute of Virology. Big win for accountability and medical freedom!

While [[user]], [[user]], and the rest of this administration turn their backs on the American people, we passed the Secure the Border Act, in the House. We must protect our great nation and we must defend our southern border from this invasion!
